value.title: MLOps startup Iterative.ai nabs $20M
value.excerpt: Iterative.ai, an MLOps platform that maintains a number of open source data management projects, raised $20 million in funding.

value.title: Washington State County Becomes First in US to Ban Facial Recognition Software Over Concerns of Racism
value.excerpt: King County's ban on facial recognition software is "an important step forward in the effort to stop government use of this harmful and racist technology," said Jennifer Lee from ACLU Washington.

value.title: Microsoft Azure launches new Nvidia A100-powered supercomputing instances
value.excerpt: Microsoft’s cloud computing service Azure has launched what it claims is the fastest public cloud supercomputer. The new service named Azure ND A100 v4 Cloud GPU instances is powered by Nvidia’s A100 Tensor Core GPUs and is targeted at users with high performance and demanding workloads.

value.title: DHL extends warehouse automation partnership with Locus Robotics
value.excerpt: Robotic process automation is no longer a science experiment. This technology is no longer about figuring out what works. The time to consider whether to automate your warehouses has passed.”

value.title: 10 Ways AI And Automation Can Help Agencies Succeed
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence and automation have transformed the way people do business and show no sign of slowing down. Smart agencies are seeking new ways to leverage both.

value.title: Cyclist Use Of Key London Bridge Higher Now Than Bike Boom Of 1949, Finds AI Camera Count
value.excerpt: AI-powered traffic counting has found that cyclists accounted for 41% of all road users on Blackfriars Bridge, London.

value.title: Machine Learning Is Not A 'Better Horse'
value.excerpt: Too often, it can sound like the trucking industry views machine learning as a “better horse.” It is common to hear the idea that better, bigger data will allow the industry to better forecast prices far into the future.

value.title: Want Perfect Summer Skin? Try Proven Skincare’s AI-Based Custom Skincare

value.title: TruEra launches tool for spotting and contextualizing AI bias, other issues
value.excerpt: AI startup TruEra lanched an enterprise tool for monitoring and diagnosing issues in machine learning models, including bias.

value.title: UK's AI startup scene has grown 600 percent over past decade
value.excerpt: The country's £32.76 billion AI sector brought in £2.41 billion worth of investment in 2020 alone, according to Tech Nation

value.title: US-China tech war: Beijing-funded AI researchers surpass Google and OpenAI with new language processing model
value.excerpt: The WuDao 2.0 natural language processing model had 1.75 trillion parameters, topping similar models developed in the US as China pushes to close in on its rival in critical technologies.

value.title: Amazon AWS Machine Learning Summit keynote kicks off with ‘few-shot learning’
value.excerpt: Amazon AWS's AI and machine learning executives Swami Sivasubramanian and Bratin Saha lead the morning keynote.

value.title: Microsoft turns attention to multi-cloud and AI with Azure updates
value.excerpt: Microsoft made over 100 product and service announcements last week. Those related to its Azure ecosystem were the most interesting.

value.title: AI-driven platform XraySetu to facilitate early-Covid interventions over Whatsapp
value.excerpt: XraySetu is specifically designed to identify COVID positive patients even from low-resolution Chest X-Ray images sent over Whatsapp.

value.title: Banned gamblers in South Australia to be found using facial recognition tech
value.excerpt: A number of gaming rooms in South Australia have adopted facial recognition tech from Vix Vizion as part of the state's gambling reforms that went live in December.

value.title: Use Amazon Translate in Amazon SageMaker Notebooks
value.excerpt: Amazon Translate is a neural machine translation service that delivers fast, high-quality, and affordable language translation in 71 languages and 4,970 language pairs. value.title: Can Finance Companies Trust AI? Interview With Sravan Kasarla, CDO, Thrivent
value.excerpt: Understanding business success is not simply about transactions or policies, but about establishing and strengthening long term relationships with the customers. Can finance companies trust AI to help manage customer relationships and enhance trust?

value.title: This AI robot mimics human expressions to build trust with users
value.excerpt: Scientists at Columbia University have developed a robot that mimics the facial expressions of humans to gain their trust.

value.title: Abstracting Amazon? Fakespot Layers AI-Based Trust Over Digital Commerce
